PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-11702019-08-07,  ,  ISED,  NRC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActFederal Public Sector Labour Relations Act
SubjectNational Research Council of Canada - Research Council Employees' Association ** Collective Agreement **
PrecisOrder approving the ENTRY by National Research Council of Canada into a COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with the Research Council Employees' Association that covers all employees in the PURCHASING AND SUPPLY bargaining unit for the period beginning on May 1, 2018 and ending on April 30, 2022.
AttachmentsAttachment
